PsychicRitualDef.label: narehate brainwipe
PsychicRitualDef.description:
With the aid of dark archotech intelligence, it is possible to temporarily control a narehate of a witch through brainwipe, or extend the control duration for an already controlled narehate.

Such an attempt will completely destroy the witch's mind, reducing her to a narehate driven by instinct.

Warning: This process is irreversible.
PsychicRitualDef.outcomeDescription: The target narehate of a witch will be unilaterally transformed into a controlled form.\n\nDepending on the current ritual quality, extends the brainwashing control of the narehate of a witch by {0} days.

PsychicRitualRoleDef.label: transformation target
PsychicRitualRoleDef.description: A humanoid in the state of being a narehate of a witch.
PsychicRitualRoleDef.allowedConditions: Default, Downed, Prisoner, Slave, Sleeping, IdeoUnwilling, NoPsychicSensitivity,MentalState, NonPlayerFaction, NonHumanlike, Humanlike, SubHuman, Bleeding
